author: Deleted User
content:
Looking at the spec, I cannot figure out when any `ProposerSlashing` and/or `SignedBeaconBlockHeader` objects are created - am I missing something?
This came up while I was wondering how to implement the `/v1/beacon/headers` API endpoint

author: .vbuterin
content: Users create proposer slashings and sign block headers locally

author: .vbuterin
content: I guess if it's anywhere it should be in the honest validator guide

author: djrtwo
content: When creating a signed beacon block,  because of the way SSZ hashing works, you can replace the body with its root. The resulting object is a signed beacon block header and the signature remains valid
